title: Letter Request
description: Details of a request to send a letter, including PDF location and metadata

clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: Identifier for the client which this letter is being sent on behalf of

campaignId.title: Campaign ID
campaignId.description: Identifier for the campaign which this letter is a part of

specificationId.title: Specification ID
specificationId.description: Reference to the letter specification which should be used to produce a letter pack for this request

requestId.title: Request ID
requestId.description: Identifier for the request which this letter request is part of

requestItemId.title: Request Item ID
requestItemId.description: Identifier for the request item which this letter request is part of

requestItemPlanId.title: Request Item Plan ID
requestItemPlanId.description: Identifier for the request item plan which associated with this letter request

supplierId.title: Supplier ID
supplierId.description: Identifier for the supplier which should print and post the letter

templateId.title: Template ID
templateId.description: Identifier for the template used to compose this letter

url.title: Letter URL
url.description:
Unsigned S3 URL where the generated letter body can be retrieved. It will be signed for access on retrieval.

The file will be a PDF file in A4 format suitable for printing.

sha256Hash.title: SHA-256 Hash
sha256Hash.description: SHA-256 checksum of the PDF file

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: Timestamp when the letter PDF was created

pageCount.title: Page Count
pageCount.description: Number of pages in the PDF document
